sudoku.model

Class SudokuBoardSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.model.SudokuBoardSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SudokuSolver

    public class SudokuBoardSolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements SudokuSolver
    A class to administrate solution strategies and apply them to Sudokus.

    • Method Detail

      • addPossibleBoards

        private void addPossibleBoards(java.util.Stack<Board> boards,
                               Board currentBoard)
        Adds all boards to the stack boards that come from filling the cell with the least possibilities with all the numbers that still may be inserted into them.
        Parameters:
        boards - The stack the boards should be pushed onto.
        currentBoard - The board that should be processed.

      • addSaturator

        public void addSaturator(Saturator saturator)
        Registers a solution strategy at this SudokuSolver. This strategy will be used in all following tries to find a solution.
        Specified by:
        addSaturator in interface SudokuSolver
        Parameters:
        saturator - A solution strategy.

      • findAllSolutions

        public java.util.List<Board> findAllSolutions(Board board)
        Finds all solutions for a given Sudoku puzzle by applying the registered solution strategies and by backtracking. All possible solution are computed. The result is repeatable, i.e., for a given Sudoku always the same solutions in the same order are computed.
        Specified by:
        findAllSolutions in interface SudokuSolver
        Parameters:
        board - The Sudoku to find the solutions for. Will not be changed.
        Returns:
        A list of all solutions of board.

      • findFirstSolution

        public Board findFirstSolution(Board board)
        Finds a single solution for a given Sudoku puzzle by applying the registered solution strategies and by backtracking. The result is repeatable, i.e., for a given Sudoku always the same solution is computed, independent of the number of (other) solutions it has. While solving, board.clone() is called. Thus, an object different from board is returned.
        Specified by:
        findFirstSolution in interface SudokuSolver
        Parameters:
        board - The Sudoku to find a solution for. Will not be changed.
        Returns:
        A solution of board or null, if it is not solvable.

      • getCellWithLeastPossibilities

        private int[] getCellWithLeastPossibilities(Board board)
        Returns the first cell going from upper left corner right and down in board that is not set yet and has the least numbers that it can be set with.
        Parameters:
        board - The board to search through.
        Returns:
        The coordinates of the cell with the least possibilities.

      • getSolvedSudokus

        private java.util.List<Board> getSolvedSudokus(Board board,
                                               boolean firstOnly)
        Returns a list containing either just the first found or all solutions depending on firstOnly
        Parameters:
        board - The board to be solved
        firstOnly - Indicator if only the first solution is needed.
        Returns:
        A list containing solved boards.

      • saturate

        public Board saturate(Board board)
        Applies all registered solution strategies on the game board board until a global fix point will be reached. While saturating, board.clone() is called. Thus, an object different from board is returned.
        Specified by:
        saturate in interface SudokuSolver
        Parameters:
        board - The Sudoku puzzle on which the solution strategies will be applied. Will not be changed.
        Returns:
        A saturated version of board or null, if it is not solvable.
